channel.title: Parallel Working on Host System
channel.description:
Hey guys,
is it dangerous to work in Whonix Workstation in Virtual Box and at your host system at the same time?
For example: Doing something in Whonix workstation and at the same time you´re logged in into Facebook on your host system.
Best regards

item.title: Parallel Working on Host System
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Has been explained here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/DoNot#Do_not_use_clearnet_and_Tor_at_the_same_time.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
